name: Kidnap The Princess
description:
Everyone appreciate the hard work the hero does, but what about the villain that has to prepare all the challenges for them to overcome?

In this short game you get to play the role of the villain kidnapping the princess.

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move.

Use Space to attack (if an enemy is in range)

Use M Key to mute/unmute

Credits:

The sounds and font are by Kenney: Kenney • Assets
